definition: a successful swing in a baseball game, to pay unsolicited and usually unwanted sexual attention to

noun

= example: a successful swing in a baseball game
- a conspicuous success
= example: a conspicuous success

- a murder carried out by an underworld syndicate

= example: a dose of an illicit drug
